data.message: Hi Facebook , please I need help. I reset my forgotten password and now I cannot get the code sent to my hotmail as the Microsoft have had deactivated that hotmail as it wasn't used for few year and one  of my trusted contacts had the same problem. Please assist me to get the new code via SMS To my phone number.

replies.message: Hi Zina. If you're having trouble logging into your Facebook account, here are a few things to try first: http://bit.ly/2izGZEP. You can also learn how to regain access to your account here: http://bit.ly/2B59lOV. Additionally, if the problem continues, please report it to us: http://bit.ly/2jL0cHa. -Tenaya
Facebook  I tried everything but did not work my only chance to get it back is to get the password by SMS please please please, I cannot survive without Facebook
Thank you for the love, Nasir! -Elizabeth
Facebook  i did not get any help yet though I followed all the steps mentioned
My account has been disable..how i can enable it.
Hi Oboj. If you think your account was disabled by mistake, please submit an appeal. Learn more: http://bit.ly/2Bue9gP. -Tenaya
